In the literature, CNN frameworks often include convolutional and pooling layers
successively, as a measure to reduce data complexity and introduce translation
invariant features. Nevertheless, such an approach is not strictly part of the architec-
ture, and in the time series domain [...] DeepConvLSTM does not include pooling
